_json.title: Why I Don’t Use the Word ‘Forgiveness’ in Trauma Therapy
_json.gridTitle: Why I Don’t Use the Word ‘Forgiveness’ in Trauma Therapy
_json.description: Understand that if a person comes in and finds that the word “forgiveness” resonates, I do not discourage it. We roll with it. But often people struggle with this word, and rightfully so. They do not want to imply what happened to them was in any way OK. They don’t want to excuse the perpetrator’s behavior. They feel the perpetrator is not deserving of forgiveness. The worst thing I can do as a therapist is to talk people out of the way they feel. #forgiveness #trauma #therapy #behaviour #cptsd
